import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FiPower, FiTrash2 } from 'react-icons/fi'; import api from '../../services/api'; import './style.css'; import logoImg from '../../assets/logo.svg'; export default function Profile() { const [ incidents, setIncidents ] = useState([]); const ongId = localStorage.getItem('ongId'); const ongName = localStorage.getItem('ongName'); useEffect(() => { api.get('profile', { headers: { Authorization: ongId } }).then(response => { setIncidents(response.data); }) }, []); return (
